CO05.title: Get the best rates from providers

recommendations.title: Implement Azure Cost Management with Budgets and Alerts
recommendations.description: Configure Azure Cost Management and set budgets for production, test, and development environments to monitor spend, generate alerts on threshold breaches, and drive cost accountability across development teams.

recommendations.title: Eliminate Unused Resources and Orphaned Persistent Volumes
recommendations.description: Regularly audit for and clean up orphaned persistent volumes, unused load balancer rules, and legacy component deployments to avoid ongoing charges for stale resources.

recommendations.title: Right-Size Non-Production Environments
recommendations.description: Review and reduce resource allocations for development and QA clusters. Differentiate production from non-production with smaller node pools, cheaper storage tiers, and dev/test pricing to minimize spend.

recommendations.title: Enable Cluster Autoscaler and Improve Scaling Policies
recommendations.description: Activate AKS cluster autoscaler and expand horizontal pod autoscaling to all microservices, tuning min/max replica counts based on load, aligning scaling with actual demand and billing increments to lower costs.

recommendations.title: Switch to Consumption-Based and Autoscale Tiers for Key Services
recommendations.description: Configure Azure Cosmos DB for autoscale throughput; move Redis and other services to scalable or consumption-based SKUs. Dynamically provision during peak traffic only.

recommendations.title: Use Azure Reservations, Savings Plans, and Hybrid Benefit
recommendations.description: Leverage 1- or 3-year Azure Reserved Instances, Savings Plans for VMs, and Azure Hybrid Benefit for eligible workloads to secure discounted rates and optimize compute spend.

recommendations.title: Set Resource Quotas and Policies for Governance
recommendations.description: Introduce Azure Policy assignments and AKS resource quotas to restrict resource sprawl, enforce naming/tagging standards, and prevent accidental over-provisioning at namespace or subscription level.

recommendations.title: Tag Resources for Team Accountability and Chargeback
recommendations.description: Create and enforce a resource tagging strategy (e.g. owner, environment, team) to enable cost attribution, reporting, and internal chargebacks, fostering shared responsibility for spend.

recommendations.title: Optimize Log Analytics and Application Insights Costs
recommendations.description: Reduce Log Analytics workspace data retention, implement daily caps on Application Insights, and configure sampling to lower observability costs while retaining key insights.

recommendations.title: Deploy Automated Backup Policies for Stateful Data
recommendations.description: Configure automated backup and retention policies for databases (Cosmos DB, SQL, Redis); align backup frequency and retention to business RPO/RTO, minimizing unnecessary storage costs.

recommendations.title: Move Microservices to Separate Namespaces and Resource Groups
recommendations.description: Segment AKS cluster namespaces and group microservices/resources by team or purpose, enabling better quota enforcement, improved governance, and more targeted cost allocation.

recommendations.title: Automate Container Image Patch and Retention Policies
recommendations.description: Enforce automated image patching, set up vulnerability scanning, and implement container registry retention policies to reduce obsolete image storage costs and improve security posture.

recommendations.title: Train Development Teams in Cloud Cost Fundamentals
recommendations.description: Invest in Azure cloud cost management training for development, DevOps, and operations teams. Build a consistent FinOps culture and embed cost awareness in sprint/release process.
